review: The Amazon Fire Stick found Me!  Always get the emails and advertisments that are catered to my buying, and this one got me.  Had never heard of the product.  Was somewhat dismayed  with Amazon prime because it was not compatible with Apple TV and was told I needed to purchase a ROKU player thru amazon in order to stream any movies thru my television.  I said "Heck with that".  Low and behold I wait a year and a half and Amazon comes out with The "Fire Stick".  Lucky enough for me I had a Best Buy gift card that I had to use up, but when I got to best buy and asked the tech what he thought about the Fire Stick.....He raved about it........I figured I had nothing to lose...I bought it.  To say that it was a snap to set it up is an understatement.  This thing Rocks!  Rocks I say!  Easy set up and start watching movies with full surround sound.  If you don't have one...Get it now!
author: joy

review: This little stick is amazing!  $39 for what it does? I got it for our living room tv. I had a Roku box.  With Roku Netflix was always interrupted.  You still do get some buffering from time to time on the Fire Stick, but nothing like the Roku and the Fire stick recovers A LOT faster!  I got both my daughters Roku sticks for their bedrooms before this purchase and I wished I got them the fire stick.  The roku sticks were more $$$ and not as good!  Amazing product, Amazon!
